title: Invitation font
content:
Saw this on an invitation...would be grateful if someone could help me figure out what it is.  
Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207214610im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sample_5902.jpg)

 [‹ Please help me ID this sans serif.](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207214610/http:/typophile.com/node/27819 "Go to previous forum topic") [What is the "Monopoly" (original) typeface. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207214610/http:/typophile.com/node/27832 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Avi

comments.content: Yes, it’s a pity that it wasn’t used to its full capabilities. Thanks again for your help
Ouch, what a travesty to such an elegant and well designed typeface. :-o

It could have been so much more...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207214610im_/http:/typophile.com/files/InDesign002_3926.png)
